item.title: How do i make autocachedownloader?
item.dc:creator: @T0rvascape T0rvascape
item.description:
@T0rvascape wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:471100”][quote author=T0rvascape link=topic=588635.msg4173449#msg4173449 date=1354666821]
The subject says it all, : how do i
[/quote]

First, you’d need to upload your cache somewhere that can be directly access through a URL (not a redirect link or anything like that).

Then you’d need to add in the client, upon start up, check if there is a new cache available, and if so, download the new cache. It’s not the best way, but it’s certainly the simplest.[/quote]

can I use dropbox for this?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make autocachedownloader?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

T0rvascape:

The subject says it all, : how do i

First, you’d need to upload your cache somewhere that can be directly access through a URL (not a redirect link or anything like that).

Then you’d need to add in the client, upon start up, check if there is a new cache available, and if so, download the new cache. It’s not the best way, but it’s certainly the simplest.

Read full topic
